author: The Red Village
title: The Red Village
description: A dark fantasy metaverse game with team-based combat mechanics, migrated to LightLink to reduce transaction fees, enhance the user experience with improved throughput, and simplify onboarding through gasless transactions.
shortDescription: A dark fantasy metaverse game with team-based combat mechanics, migrated to LightLink to reduce transaction fees, enhance the user experience with improved throughput, and simplify onboarding through gasless transactions.

author: Elektrik
title: Elektrik
description: Elektrik is a decentralized exchange that utilizes Enterprise Mode to enable its users to swap tokens without any fees.
shortDescription: Elektrik is a decentralized exchange that utilizes Enterprise Mode to enable its users to swap tokens without any fees.

author: Translucia
title: Translucia
description: Translucia is a Multiverse Convergence solution that aims to accelerate the entry of traditional businesses into Web3 by uniting third-party metaverses. Essentially, it is an infrastructure project that connects metaverses into a multiverse, offering players an endless world to explore.
shortDescription: Translucia is a Multiverse Convergence solution that aims to accelerate the entry of traditional businesses into Web3 by uniting third-party metaverses.

author: Mittaria
title: Mittaria
description: Mittaria is a Web3 metaverse for creators to connect, co-own, and co-create in fields such as animation, music, movies, and fashion.
shortDescription: Mittaria is a Web3 metaverse for creators to connect, co-own, and co-create in fields such as animation, music, movies, and fashion.

author: Curate
title: Curate
description: Curate is an NFT marketplace that enabled zero transaction fees after migrating to LightLink and activating Enterprise Mode. Claiming, minting, and trading NFTs on Curate is free from gas fees.
